pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared M2_Entity = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
    sysdate extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
    entity,
    dept,
    acct,
    proj,
    interco,
    gl_period,
    tb.period_year fiscal_year,
    gp.end_date period_end_date,
    item_number,
    item_description,
    cat_segment1,
    cat_segment2,
    cat_segment3,
    transaction_source,
    tb.inventory_item_id,
    tb.organization_id,
    vendor_id,
    sales_service_code,
    currency_code,
    conversion_rate,
    SUM(accounted_net)         accounted_net,
    SUM(accounted_net_usd)     accounted_net_usd,
    SUM(tran_qty)              transaction_quantity,
    m20_tbu,
    m20_pfc,
    allocation_percent,
    hfm_account,
    hp_account,
    hfm_icp,
    hfm_function,
    hfm_product,
    hp_product,
    hfm_product_group,
    hp_spc_account,
    alt_hfm_product,
    alt_hfm_product_group,
    alt_hp_product
FROM
    xxcoh.xxcoh_m2_report_tb tb,
    gl.gl_periods gp
WHERE
    entity = '"&ENTITY&"'
    AND tb.GL_PERIOD = gp.period_name
    AND PERIOD_SET_NAME = 'COHR Calendar'
    AND tb.period_year >= (
        SELECT
            period_year - "&YearOffset&"
        FROM
            gl.gl_periods gp
        WHERE
            trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN gp.start_date AND gp.end_date
            AND period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
    )
GROUP BY
    entity,
    dept,
    acct,
    proj,
    interco,
    tbd,
    gl_period,
    tb.period_year,
    gp.end_date,
    item_number,
    item_description,
    cat_segment1,
    cat_segment2,
    cat_segment3,
    transaction_source,
    currency_code,
    tb.inventory_item_id,
    tb.organization_id,
    set_of_books_id,
    vendor_id,
    sales_service_code,
    conversion_rate,
    m20_tbu,
    m20_pfc,
    allocation_percent,
    hfm_account,
    hp_account,
    hfm_icp,
    hfm_function,
    hfm_product,
    hp_product,
    hfm_product_group,
    hp_spc_account,
    alt_hfm_product,
    alt_hfm_product_group,
    alt_hp_product
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ENTITY", "Entity"}, {"DEPT", "Department"}, {"ACCT", "Account"}, {"PROJ", "Project"}, {"INTERCO", "Inter Company"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "Description"}, {"TRANSACTION_QUANTITY", "Transaction Quantity"}, {"TRANSACTION_SOURCE", "Transaction Source"}, {"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency"}, {"SALES_SERVICE_CODE", "Sales Service Code"}, {"ACCOUNTED_NET", "Accounted Net"}, {"ACCOUNTED_NET_USD", "Accounted Net USD"}, {"GL_PERIOD", "GL Period"}, {"PERIOD_END_DATE", "Period End Date"}, {"M20_TBU", "M20 TBU"}, {"M20_PFC", "M20 PFC"}, {"ALLOCATION_PERCENT", "Allocation Percent"}, {"HFM_ACCOUNT", "HFM Account"}, {"HP_ACCOUNT", "HP Account"}, {"HFM_ICP", "HFM ICP"}, {"HFM_FUNCTION", "HFM Function"}, {"HFM_PRODUCT", "HFM Product"}, {"HP_PRODUCT", "HP Product"}, {"HFM_PRODUCT_GROUP", "HFM Product Group"}, {"HP_SPC_ACCOUNT", "HP SPC Account"}, {"CAT_SEGMENT1", "Item TBU"}, {"CAT_SEGMENT2", "Item Product Family"}, {"CAT_SEGMENT3", "Item Product Line"}, {"ALT_HFM_PRODUCT", "Alternate HFM Product"}, {"ALT_HFM_PRODUCT_GROUP", "Alternate HFM Product Group"}, {"ALT_HP_PRODUCT", "Alternate HP Product"}, {"FISCAL_YEAR", "Fiscal Year"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared EO_Reserve = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT
  sysdate extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
   XRH.HEADER_STATUS,
   XRH.PLAN_NAME,
   XRL.*
FROM
   APPS.XXCOH_RSV_HEADERS XRH,
   APPS.XXCOH_RSV_LINES XRL 
WHERE
   1 = 1 
   AND XRH.RESERVE_HEADER_ID = XRL.RESERVE_HEADER_ID 
   AND XRH.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
   "
   , CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"HEADER_STATUS", "Header Status"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "GL Period Name"}, {"PLAN_NAME", "Plan Name"}, {"RESERVE_PERIOD", "Reserve Period"}, {"RESERVE_TYPE", "Reserve Type"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"LINE_STATUS", "Line Status"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "Item Description"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_QUANTITY", "System Reserve Quantity"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE", "System Reserve Ext Value"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE", "System Reserve Trf Ext Value"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_CATEGORY", "System Reserve Category"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_RATE", "System Reserve Rate"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "System Reserve Amount"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT", "System Reserve Trf Amount"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_COMMENT", "System Reserve Comment"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_QUANTITY", "Review1 Reserve Quantity"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE", "Review1 Reserve Ext Value"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE", "Review1 Reserve Trf Ext Value"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_CATEGORY", "Review1 Reserve Category"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_RATE", "Review1 Reserve Rate"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "Review1 Reserve Amount"}, {"REVIEW1_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT", "Review1 Reserve Trf Amount"}, {"REVIEW1_OVERRIDE_REASON", "Review1 Override Reason"}, {"REVIEW1_COMMENT", "Review1 Comment"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_QUANTITY", "Review2 Reserve Quantity"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE", "Review2 Reserve Ext Value"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE", "Review2 Reserve Trf Ext Value"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_CATEGORY", "Review2 Reserve Category"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_RATE", "Review2 Reserve Rate"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "Review2 Reserve Amount"}, {"REVIEW2_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT", "Review2 Reserve Trf Amount"}, {"REVIEW2_OVERRIDE_REASON", "Review2 Override Reason"}, {"REVIEW2_COMMENT", "Review2 Comment"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_QUANTITY", "Final Reserve Quantity"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE", "Final Reserve Ext Value"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE", "Final Reserve Trf Ext Value"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_CATEGORY", "Final Reserve Category"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_RATE", "Final Reserve Rate"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "Final Reserve Amount"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT", "Final Reserve Trf Amount"}, {"FINAL_RESERVE_AMOUNT_USD", "Final Reserve Amount Usd"}, {"FINAL_TAKEN_FROM", "Final Taken From"}, {"FINAL_FINANCE_APPROVE_DATE", "Final Finance Approve Date"}, {"REVIEW1_USER", "Review1 User"}, {"REVIEW1_DATE", "Review1 Date"}, {"REVIEW2_USER", "Review2 User"}, {"REVIEW2_DATE", "Review2 Date"}, {"REVIEW3_USER", "Review3 User"}, {"REVIEW3_DATE", "Review3 Date"}, {"OPERATING_UNIT", "Operating Unit"}, {"LEDGER_SHORT_NAME", "Ledger Short Name"}, {"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency Code"}, {"ORGANIZATION_CATEGORY", "Organization Category"}, {"RESERVE_ENTITY", "Reserve Entity"}, {"RESERVE_DEPARTMENT", "Reserve Department"}, {"RESERVE_ACCOUNT", "Reserve Account"}, {"RESERVE_IC", "Reserve IC"}, {"TBU", "TBU"}, {"PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Product Family"}, {"PRODUCT_LINE", "Product Line"}, {"ORG_TBU", "Org TBU"}, {"ORG_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Org Product Family"}, {"ORG_PRODUCT_LINE", "Org Product Line"}, {"FIN_TBU", "Fin TBU"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Fin Product Family"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"GREEN_SUPPLY_STATUS", "Green Supply Status"}, {"ASSET_FLAG", "Asset Flag"}, {"NETTABLE_FLAG", "Nettable Flag"}, {"MAKE_BUY", "Make Buy"}, {"SERVICE_LEAD_TIME", "Service Lead Time"}, {"DATE_LAST_ACTIVITY", "Date Last Activity"}, {"LOT_SIZE", "Lot Size"}, {"ITEM_COST_STANDARD", "Item Cost Standard"}, {"ITEM_TRF_COST", "Item Trf Cost"}, {"ITEM_PRICE", "Item Price"}, {"CLASS_CODE", "Class Code"}, {"ACCT_CLASS_TYPE", "Acct Class Type"}, {"ITEM_TYPE", "Item Type"}, {"ITEM_STATUS_CODE", "Item Status Code"}, {"ABC_CLASS_CODE", "Abc Class Code"}, {"SUBINVENTORY", "Subinventory"}, {"LOT_NUMBER", "Lot Number"}, {"SITE_CODE", "Site Code"}, {"CONTROL_ORG_CODE", "Control Org Code"}, {"LOC_SUB", "Loc Sub"}, {"LOC_ROW", "Loc Row"}, {"LOC_RACK", "Loc Rack"}, {"LOC_SHELF", "Loc Shelf"}, {"LOC_BIN", "Loc Bin"}, {"NETTABLE_OH_QUANTITY", "Nettable Onhand Quantity"}, {"NONNETTABLE_OH_QUANTITY", "Non Nettable Onhand Quantity"}, {"NETTABLE_RCV_QUANTITY", "Nettable RCV Quantity"}, {"NONNETTABLE_RCV_QUANTITY", "Non Nettable RCV Quantity"}, {"NETTABLE_ITRN_QUANTITY", "Nettable ITRN Quantity"}, {"NONNETTABLE_ITRN_QUANTITY", "Non Nettable ITRN Quantity"}, {"WIP_REMAINING_QUANTITY", "WIP Remaining Quantity"}, {"TOT_NETTABLE_QUANTITY", "Total Nettable Quantity"}, {"TOT_NONNETTABLE_QUANTITY", "Total Non Nettable Quantity"}, {"TOT_RESULTING_QUANTITY", "Total Resulting Quantity"}, {"TOT_NETTABLE_EXT_VALUE", "Total Nettable Ext Value"}, {"TOT_NONNETTABLE_EXT_VALUE", "Total Non Nettable Ext Value"}, {"TOT_ONHAND_EXT_VALUE", "Total Onhand Ext Value"}, {"TOT_RECEIVING_EXT_VALUE", "Total Receiving Ext Value"}, {"TOT_INTRANSIT_EXT_VALUE", "Total Intransit Ext Value"}, {"DEMAND_0_03", "Demand 0-03"}, {"DEMAND_0_12", "Demand 0-12"}, {"DEMAND_0_18", "Demand 0-18"}, {"DEMAND_0_24", "Demand 0-24"}, {"DEMAND_SUBSTITUTE", "Demand Substitute"}, {"USAGE_0_03", "Usage 0-03"}, {"USAGE_0_12", "Usage 0-12"}, {"USAGE_0_18", "Usage 0-18"}, {"USAGE_0_24", "Usage 0-24"}, {"USAGE_13_24", "Usage 13-24"}, {"USAGE_SUBSTITUTE", "Usage Substitute"}, {"OPEN_ORDER_0_03", "Open Order 0-03"}, {"OPEN_ORDER_0_12", "Open Order 0-12"}, {"OPEN_ORDER_0_18", "Open Order 0-18"}, {"OPEN_ORDER_0_24", "Open Order 0-24"}, {"OPEN_ORDER_SUBSTITUTE", "Open Order Substitute"}, {"RESULTING_QUANTITY_LEFTOVER", "Resulting Quantity Leftover"}, {"WIP_ENTITY_NAME", "WIP Entity Name"}, {"WIP_JOB_TYPE", "WIP Job Type"}, {"WIP_JOB_STATUS", "WIP Job Status"}, {"WIP_DATE_RELEASED", "WIP Date Released"}, {"WIP_TOTAL_COSTS_INCURRED", "WIP Total Costs Incurred"}, {"WIP_TOTAL_COSTS_RELIEVED", "WIP Total Costs Relieved"}, {"WIP_TOTAL_VARIANCES_RELIEVED", "WIP Total Variances Relieved"}, {"WIP_TOTAL_NET_ACTIVITIES", "WIP Total Net Activities"}, {"WIP_DAYS_RELEASED", "WIP Days Released"}, {"WIP_MONTHS_RELEASED", "WIP Months Released"}, {"WIP_AGING_BUCKET", "WIP Aging Bucket"}, {"SERIAL_NUM_CONTROL_CODE", "Serial Number Control Code"}, {"SERIAL_NUMBER", "Serial Number"}, {"SERIAL_NUMBER_OVERRIDE", "Serial Number Override"}, {"SERIAL_NUMBER_FINAL", "Serial Number Final"}, {"SERIAL_NUMBER_HISTORY", "Serial Number History"}, {"SERIAL_NUM_STATUS", "Serial Number Status"}, {"LC_QUANTITY", "LC Quantity"}, {"LC_EARLIEST_TRX_DATE", "LC Earliest Trx Date"}, {"LC_LATEST_STOCK_DATE", "LC Latest Stock Date"}, {"LC_START_DATE", "LC Start Date"}, {"LC_START_DATE_OVERRIDE", "LC Start Date Override"}, {"LC_START_DATE_FINAL", "LC Start Date Final"}, {"LC_LOCATION_STATUS", "LC Location Status"}, {"LC_PERIOD_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "LC Period Reserve Amount"}, {"LC_CURRENT_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "LC Current Reserve Amount"}, {"PERIOD_YEAR", "Period Year"}, {"PERIOD_QUARTER", "Period Quarter"}, {"PERIOD_NUM", "Period Num"}, {"LC_PERIOD_COUNT", "LC Period Count"}, {"LC_DAYS_COUNT", "LC Days Count"}, {"LC_STATUS", "LC Status"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}, {"CREATED_BY", "Created By"}, {"LAST_UPDATE_DATE", "Last Update Date"}, {"LAST_UPDATED_BY", "Last Updated By"}, {"QUANTITY1", "Quantity1"}, {"QUANTITY2", "Quantity2"}, {"QUANTITY3", "Quantity3"}, {"QUANTITY4", "Quantity4"}, {"QUANTITY5", "Quantity5"}, {"DEMAND1", "Demand1"}, {"DEMAND2", "Demand2"}, {"DEMAND3", "Demand3"}, {"DEMAND4", "Demand4"}, {"DEMAND5", "Demand5"}, {"USAGE1", "Usage1"}, {"USAGE2", "Usage2"}, {"USAGE3", "Usage3"}, {"USAGE4", "Usage4"}, {"USAGE5", "Usage5"}, {"OPEN_ORDER1", "Open Order1"}, {"OPEN_ORDER2", "Open Order2"}, {"OPEN_ORDER3", "Open Order3"}, {"OPEN_ORDER4", "Open Order4"}, {"OPEN_ORDER5", "Open Order5"}, {"TOTAL1", "Total1"}, {"TOTAL2", "Total2"}, {"TOTAL3", "Total3"}, {"TOTAL4", "Total4"}, {"TOTAL5", "Total5"}, {"DATE1", "Date1"}, {"DATE2", "Date2"}, {"DATE3", "Date3"}, {"DATE4", "Date4"}, {"DATE5", "Date5"}, {"LOCATION1", "Location1"}, {"LOCATION2", "Location2"}, {"LOCATION3", "Location3"}, {"LOCATION4", "Location4"}, {"LOCATION5", "Location5"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_QUANTITY", "Prior Reserve Quantity"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_EXT_VALUE", "Prior Reserve Ext Value"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_TRF_EXT_VALUE", "Prior Reserve Trf Ext Value"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_CATEGORY", "Prior Reserve Category"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_RATE", "Prior Reserve Rate"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_AMOUNT", "Prior Reserve Amount"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_TRF_AMOUNT", "Prior Reserve Trf Amount"}, {"PRIOR_RESERVE_AMOUNT_USD", "Prior Reserve Amount Usd"}, {"PRIOR_OH_QUANTITY", "Prior Onhand Quantity"}, {"PRIOR_COMMENT", "Prior Comment"}, {"FORECAST", "Forecast"}, {"ORG_FORECAST", "Org Forecast"}, {"FIN_FORECAST", "Fin Forecast"}, {"PRIOR_OVERRIDE_REASON", "Prior Override Reason"}, {"SYSTEM_RESERVE_AMOUNT_USD", "System Reserve Amount Usd"}, {"USER_DEFINED_1", "User Defined 1"}, {"USER_DEFINED_2", "User Defined 2"}, {"USER_DEFINED_3", "User Defined 3"}, {"USER_DEFINED_4", "User Defined 4"}, {"OPS_REPORTING", "Ops Reporting"}, {"SEC_REPORTING", "SEC Reporting"}, {"OPEN_PO_0_12", "Open PO 0-12"}, {"OPEN_PO_0_24", "Open PO 0-24"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Reserve = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT
   sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
   GJH.JE_HEADER_ID,
   GCC.SEGMENT1,
   GCC.SEGMENT2,
   GCC.SEGMENT3,
   GCC.SEGMENT4,
   GCC.SEGMENT5,
   GCC.CODE_COMBINATION_ID,
   GJH.LEDGER_ID,
   GJH.JE_CATEGORY,
   GJH.JE_SOURCE,
   GJH.CURRENCY_CODE,
   GJH.POSTED_DATE,
   GJL.EFFECTIVE_DATE,
   GJL.PERIOD_NAME,
   GJL.ACCOUNTED_DR,
   GJL.ACCOUNTED_CR,
   nvl(GJL.ACCOUNTED_DR,0) - nvl(GJL.ACCOUNTED_CR,0) ACCOUNTED_NET,
   GJL.DESCRIPTION,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE1,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE2,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE3,
   GJL.ATTRIBUTE4
FROM
   APPS.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS GCC,
   APPS.GL_PERIOD_STATUSES GPS,
   APPS.GL_LEDGERS GL,
   APPS.GL_JE_LINES GJL,
   APPS.GL_JE_HEADERS GJH,
   APPS.ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD 
WHERE
   ORGANIZATION_CODE =  '"&ORG&"' 
   AND OOD.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = GL.LEDGER_ID 
   AND GL.LEDGER_ID = GJH.LEDGER_ID 
   AND GPS.LEDGER_ID = 1 
   AND GPS.APPLICATION_ID = 101 
   AND GJH.STATUS = 'P' 
   AND GJH.JE_HEADER_ID = GJL.JE_HEADER_ID 
   AND GJL.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = GCC.CODE_COMBINATION_ID 
   AND GCC.SEGMENT1 = '"&ENTITY&"' 
   AND GCC.SEGMENT3 in ( 
    '05500',
    '05505',
    '05510',
    '05540',
    '05530',
    '05550')
   "
   , CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"JE_CATEGORY", "JE Category"}, {"JE_SOURCE", "JE Source"}, {"CURRENCY_CODE", "Currency Code"}, {"POSTED_DATE", "Posted Date"}, {"EFFECTIVE_DATE", "Effective Date"}, {"PERIOD_NAME", "GL Period Name"}, {"ACCOUNTED_DR", "Accounted Dr"}, {"ACCOUNTED_CR", "Accounted Cr"}, {"ACCOUNTED_NET", "Accounted Net"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "JE Description"}, {"SEGMENT1", "Entity"}, {"SEGMENT2", "Department"}, {"SEGMENT3", "Account"}, {"SEGMENT4", "Project"}, {"SEGMENT5", "Intercompany"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Corporate_FX_Rate = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
 SELECT
 sysdate extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
    from_currency,
    to_currency,
    gdr.conversion_date,
    gdr.conversion_type,
    gdr.conversion_Rate usd_rate,
    CASE
        WHEN sob.currency_code = from_currency THEN
            'Yes'
        ELSE
            'No'
    END from_base_currency
FROM
    apps.gl_daily_rates_v                gdr,
    apps.org_organization_definitions    ood,
    apps.gl_sets_of_books                sob
WHERE
        conversion_type = 'Corporate'
    AND to_currency = 'USD'
    AND ood.set_of_books_id = sob.set_of_books_id
    AND ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"FROM_CURRENCY", "From Currency"}, {"TO_CURRENCY", "To Currency"}, {"CONVERSION_DATE", "Conversion Date"}, {"CONVERSION_TYPE", "Conversion Type"}, {"USD_RATE", "USD Rate"}, {"FROM_BASE_CURRENCY", "From Base Currency Flag"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Inventory_Value = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
    sysdate extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
    invv.gl_period,
    invv.inventory_item_id,
    invv.item_number,
    invv.item_desc,
    nvl(invv.org_category_id, invv.category_id)            key_category_id,
    invv.item_tbu,
    invv.item_product_family,
    invv.source_type,
    invv.item_cost,
    invv.cost_incurred,
    invv.cost_relieved,
    invv.cost_variance,
    invv.je_source_category,
    invv.operations_reporting,
    invv.cs_demand_source,
    invv.cs_supply_source,
    invv.exclude_flag,
    invv.exclude_comment,
    invv.wip_class,
    invv.wip_class_code,
    invv.item_type,
    invv.planner_code,
    substr(invv.abc_class, 1, 1)                          abc_class,
    invv.item_status,
    invv.inv_status,
    invv.subinventory_code,
    invv.account,
    invv.inv_quantity,
    invv.inv_value,
    invv.inv_value_usd,
    invv.fiscal_period_id,
    invv.fiscal_week_id,
    invv.fiscal_week,
    (invv.fiscal_year * 100 + to_number(substr(fiscal_week,-2)) )        week_series,
    invv.scenario,
    invv.fiscal_month,
    invv.material_cost,
    invv.material_overhead_cost,
    invv.outside_processing_cost,
    invv.overhead_cost,
    invv.resource_cost,
    invv.wip_job_id,
    invv.wip_job_no,
    round(invv.currency_rate, 4)                          usd_rate,
    invv.fin_product_group,
    invv.fin_product_family,
    invv.fin_forecast_field,
    invv.fin_product_segment,
    invv.fin_product_line,
    invv.creation_date
FROM
   XXFACTS.XX_INVVALUE_FACT INVV,
   APPS.MTL_PARAMETERS MP
WHERE
   MP.ORGANIZATION_ID = INVV.INV_ORG_ID 
   AND MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
   AND INVV.FISCAL_YEAR >= (
        SELECT
            period_year - "&YearOffset&"
        FROM
            gl.gl_periods gp
        WHERE
            trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN gp.start_date AND gp.end_date
            AND period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
    )
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"GL_PERIOD", "Period Name"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"ITEM_DESC", "Item Description"}, {"ITEM_TBU", "Item TBU"}, {"ITEM_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Item Product Family"}, {"SOURCE_TYPE", "Value Source"}, {"ITEM_COST", "Item Cost"}, {"COST_INCURRED", "Cost Incurred"}, {"COST_RELIEVED", "Cost Relieved"}, {"COST_VARIANCE", "Cost Variance"}, {"JE_SOURCE_CATEGORY", "JE Source Category"}, {"OPERATIONS_REPORTING", "Operations Reporting"}, {"CS_DEMAND_SOURCE", "Demand Source"}, {"CS_SUPPLY_SOURCE", "Supply Source"}, {"EXCLUDE_FLAG", "Exclude Flag"}, {"EXCLUDE_COMMENT", "Exclude Comment"}, {"WIP_CLASS", "WIP Class"}, {"WIP_CLASS_CODE", "WIP Class Code"}, {"ITEM_TYPE", "Item Type"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"ABC_CLASS", "ABC Class"}, {"ITEM_STATUS", "Item Status"}, {"INV_STATUS", "Supply Chain Status"}, {"SUBINVENTORY_CODE", "Subinventory"}, {"ACCOUNT", "Account Code"}, {"INV_QUANTITY", "Inventory Quantity"}, {"INV_VALUE", "Inventory Value"}, {"INV_VALUE_USD", "Inventory Value USD"}, {"WIP_JOB_NO", "WIP Job Number"}, {"SCENARIO", "Scenario"}, {"MATERIAL_COST", "Material Cost"}, {"MATERIAL_OVERHEAD_COST", "Material Overhead Cost"}, {"OUTSIDE_PROCESSING_COST", "OSP Cost"}, {"RESOURCE_COST", "Resource Cost"}, {"OVERHEAD_COST", "Overhead Cost"}, {"USD_RATE", "USD Rate"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_GROUP", "Finance Product Group"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Finance Product Family"}, {"FIN_FORECAST_FIELD", "Finance Forecast Field"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_SEGMENT", "Finance Product Segment"}, {"FIN_PRODUCT_LINE", "Finance Product Line"}, {"CREATION_DATE", "Creation Date"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared ENTITY = let
  ENTITY = "845" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ENTITY;
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "PPG" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
shared YearOffset = let
  YearOffset = "5" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  YearOffset;
shared LocalTZ = let
  Local = "ASIA/Singapore" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  Local;
